title: kicked from promos in silver 1 after one loss out of 5
body: basically i won 2 games in my game series then lost my next game which is 3 and i was kicked from my promos??? help?

replies.body: I've got your league history pulled up now. From what I can tell, it looks like you did win those first two matches in your miniseries but then had 2 queue dodges.  Keep in mind that [**dodges in a promo**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760) will count as a loss, which is why that promo series was ended.
ah okay i had no idea. thank you!
